results.title: Amlodipine rescues advanced iron overload cardiomyopathy in hemojuvelin knockout murine model: Clinical implications

results.title: Combinatorial approach to treat iron overload cardiomyopathy in pediatric patients with thalassemia-major: A systematic review and meta-analysis.
results.text_hl: AIM: To validate our hypothesis that adding @<m>CHEMICAL_Amlodipine</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@amlodipine@@@ to the @CHEMICAL_Iron @CHEMICAL_MESH:D007501 @@@iron@@@ chelation regimen is more efficient in alleviating @<m>DISEASE_Iron_Overload</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D019190 @@@myocardial iron overload@@@.

citations.NLM: Safwan M, Bourgleh MS, Alsudays A, Haider KH. Combinatorial approach to treat iron overload cardiomyopathy in pediatric patients with thalassemia-major: A systematic review and meta-analysis. World J Cardiol. 2025 Feb 26;17(2):103733. PMID: 40061283

results.title: A double-blind, controlled, crossover trial of amlodipine on iron overload status in transfusion dependent beta-thalassemia patients.
results.text_hl: A double-blind, controlled, crossover trial of @<m>CHEMICAL_Amlodipine</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@amlodipine@@@ on @<m>DISEASE_Iron_Overload</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D019190 @@@iron overload@@@ status in transfusion dependent @DISEASE_beta_Thalassemia @DISEASE_MESH:D017086 @@@beta-thalassemia@@@ @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@.

results.title: Comparison of the effects of calcium channel blockers plus iron chelation therapy versus chelation therapy only on iron overload in children and young adults with transfusion-dependent thalassemia: A randomized double-blind placebo-controlled trial.
results.text_hl: Lack of randomized trials prompted this study to assess the effect of calcium channel blocker (@<m>CHEMICAL_Amlodipine</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@amlodipine@@@) in combination with @CHEMICAL_Iron @CHEMICAL_MESH:D007501 @@@iron@@@ chelation therapy on @<m>DISEASE_Iron_Overload</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D019190 @@@iron overload@@@ in @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with @DISEASE_Transfusion_Reaction @DISEASE_MESH:D065227 @@@TDT@@@.

results.title: Efficacy and safety of calcium channel blockers in preventing cardiac siderosis in thalassemia patients: An updated meta-analysis with trial sequential analysis.
results.text_hl: This meta-analysis aims to establish an evidence regarding the effect of @<m>CHEMICAL_Amlodipine</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@amlodipine@@@ on @<m>DISEASE_Iron_Overload</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D019190 @@@cardiac iron overload@@@ in @DISEASE_Thalassemia @DISEASE_MESH:D013789 @@@thalassemia@@@ @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@.

results.title: A survival case of high-dose amlodipine intoxication with non-cardiogenic pulmonary edema: a case report.
results.text_hl: Conclusion: This case report emphasizes the significance of early recognition and prompt treatment of @<m>CHEMICAL_Amlodipine</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@amlodipine@@@ intoxication, which can result in serious complications like @<m>DISEASE_Iron_Overload</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D019190 @@@fluid overload@@@ and @DISEASE_Respiratory_Distress_Syndrome @DISEASE_MESH:D012128 @@@respiratory distress@@@.

citations.NLM: Pant P, Shah S, Bhattarai G, Dahal K, Bista NR, Bade S, Chapagain K, Bade S, Pant S. A survival case of high-dose amlodipine intoxication with non-cardiogenic pulmonary edema: a case report. Ann Med Surg (Lond). 2024 Nov;86(11):6689-6692. PMID: 39525708

results.title: Single-Pass Albumin Dialysis as Rescue Therapy for Pediatric Calcium Channel Blocker Overdose
results.journal: J Investig Med High Impact Case Rep
results.text_hl: Delayed decannulation due to @<m>DISEASE_Iron_Overload</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D019190 @@@fluid overload@@@ and @DISEASE_Pulmonary_Edema @DISEASE_MESH:D011654 @@@pulmonary edema@@@.

results.title: A case report of an atypical haemolytic uremic syndrome in pregnancy: something wicked this way comes
results.text_hl: @DISEASE_Hypertension @DISEASE_MESH:D006973 @@@Hypertensive crisis@@@ and @<m>DISEASE_Iron_Overload</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D019190 @@@fluid overload@@@ were aggressively treated with a combination of beta and alpha adrenergic blockers (@CHEMICAL_Labetalol @CHEMICAL_MESH:D007741 @@@labetalol@@@ 0,3 mg/kg/h by continuous intravenous infusion for the first 24 hours, @CHEMICAL_Bisoprolol @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017298 @@@bisoprolol@@@ 2,5 mg twice daily for the first 48 hours, @CHEMICAL_Doxazosin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017292 @@@doxazosin@@@ 2 mg twice daily), central sympatholytics (@CHEMICAL_Methyldopa @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008750 @@@methyldopa@@@ 250 mg twice daily for the first 72 hours, transdermal @CHEMICAL_Clonidine @CHEMICAL_MESH:D003000 @@@clonidine@@@ 5 mg by the third day), diuretics (@CHEMICAL_Furosemide @CHEMICAL_MESH:D005665 @@@furosemide@@@ 20 mg three times daily), @CHEMICAL_Calcium @CHEMICAL_MESH:D002118 @@@calcium@@@ antagonists (@<m>CHEMICAL_Amlodipine</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@amlodipine@@@ 5 mg twice daily).

citations.NLM: Catarci S, Zanfini BA, Di Muro M, Capone E, Frassanito L, Santantonio MT, Draisci G. A case report of an atypical haemolytic uremic syndrome in pregnancy: something wicked this way comes BMC Anesthesiol. 2023 Mar 28;23(1):94. PMID: 36977996

results.title: A randomized controlled trial evaluating the effects of amlodipine on myocardial iron deposition in pediatric patients with thalassemia major
results.text_hl: @<m>DISEASE_Iron_Overload</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D019190 @@@Cardiac iron overload@@@ defined by T2*<=35 ms (MIC<=0.59 mg/g) was observed in 50% of both the @<m>CHEMICAL_Amlodipine</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@amlodipine@@@ and placebo group members at baseline.
